result.title: KMP â€” Knuth-Morris-Pratt
result.content:
string p;
string t;
int pi[N];

void solve()
{

	getline(cin, t);
	getline(cin, p);
	int m = SZ(p);
	int n = SZ(t);
	pi[0] = 0;
	int j = 0;
	for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {
		while (j>0 && p[i] != p[j]) j = pi[j - 1];
		if (p[i] == p[j]) j++;
		pi[i] = j;
	}

	j = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		while (j>0 && t[i] != p[j]) j = pi[j - 1];
		if (t[i] == p[j]) j++;
		if (j == m) cout <<i-m+1<< " da topildi"<<endl;
	}



}
